original_title: An Unlikely Mormon The Conversion Story of Glenn Beck
overview: An Unlikely Mormon shows the real Glenn Beck. But be careful, Glenn's enthusiasm for his faith is contagious.  Glenn Beck is not the man he used to be. “My life changed,” says Glenn. “I may look the same. I may sound the same. But I am not the same man. . . the healing power of Jesus Christ transformed me.”
title: An Unlikely Mormon The Conversion Story of Glenn Beck
